text: Maria Dolors Renau i Manén (15 November 1936 – 29 August 2019) was a Spanish politician. She was a Deputy and a MEP from 1986 to 1987, as well as as president of Socialist International Women (1999–2003). She was born in Barcelona. Renau died on 29 August 2019 in Barcelona at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Politicians from Barcelona Category:MEPs for Spain
title: Maria Dolors Renau
